RTCPeerConnectionIceEvent.summary: The RTCPeerConnectionIceEvent interface represents events that occur in relation to {{Glossary("ICE")}} candidates with the target, usually an .

remarks.para: Only one event is of this type: .

RTCPeerConnectionIceEventCandidate.summary:
The read-only candidate property
of the interface returns the
associated with the event.
RTCPeerConnectionIceEventCandidate.value:
An object representing the ICE candidate that has been
received, or null to indicate that there are no further candidates for this
negotiation session.

RTCPeerConnectionIceEventRTCPeerConnecti.summary:
The RTCPeerConnectionIceEvent() constructor creates a new
object.
RTCPeerConnectionIceEventRTCPeerConnecti.returns: A new object, configured as specified in the provided options.
